item.title: Split DNS Resolution with VPN DNS and Local DNS
item.description: Split DNS Resolution with VPN DNS and Local DNS Edit 2019-05-16: This work is superceded by this wonderful feature in NetworkManager now: https://fedoramagazine.org/using-the-networkmanagers-dnsmasq-plugin/ Note: does not work as expected. Trouble with connecting to different wireless networks, as each one needs manual tweak. Need a better solution. I recently installed a local identity management server with Red Hat Identity Management. This is essentially a free-ipa server that hosts some certificate management, DNS, and LDAP to track both my machines and my users on my local network.
